name: 33 Treasures Demo
description:
A princess kisses a toad instead of a frog, that toad then turns into an ogre. She runs away, leaving him alone. He want to be a toad again, so he approaches a good old witch for help. She promises him to convert back only if he can recover all the 32 treasures, which were stolen from good people in her kingdom by evil dudes.

In this adventure, you fight evil mythical creatures, most of them are treasure guardians. Treasures are spread across different regions and the fight occurs on land, water and in air.

By the end of your adventure you would have found 32 treasures, and the good old witch comes to convert you. But the princess realizes her mistake and is ready to marry you by converting you into a human. Giant king, whom you met during your adventure, also wants you to marry his daughter, by turning you into a giant. Ogres residing there, looks at you as a hero, and want to you to remain forever. Your toad family awaits in a pond ahead.

That 33rd treasure is you life you choose!
